Name: One Tank Army
About the game: Lead yourself to victory in your own tank. You thought that you need the entire crew to drive such a vehicle? Then you were right. But not in this game! You have to switch between seats inside the tank in order to win. It is not a super realistic simulator but a casual game based on historical equipment. Put your multitasking to the test by trying to complete the tasks of up to 5 crew members just by yourself. Simultaneously drive, navigate, aim, load and look around - and most importantly - survive! There is also a two-player co-op mode. Choose ammunition! Blow up your opponents! Achieve victory in four different tanks on dedicated maps: Sd. Kfz. 222 3 crew members 20mm main cannon with a magazine coaxial machine gun four wheeler T-34-85 5 crew members main gun 85mm coaxial machine gun bow machine gun armour-piercing and high explosive ammunition M4A2 (76) W HVSS 5 crew members main 76mm gun coaxial machine gun bow machine gun armour-piercing and high explosive ammunition Tiger I 5 crew members main 88mm gun coaxial machine gun bow machine gun armour-piercing and high explosive ammunition
